--- select_singer_with_query_parameter.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
WHERE
  SingerID = @singerID
  AND @singerID = SingerID

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:        0,
    AllOrDistinct: nil,
    As:            nil,
    Results:       []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 18,
          NameEnd: 25,
          Name:    "Singers",
        },
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where: &ast.Where{
      Where: 26,
      Expr:  &ast.BinaryExpr{
        Op:   "AND",
        Left: &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "=",
          Left: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 34,
            NameEnd: 42,
            Name:    "SingerID",
          },
          Right: &ast.Param{
            Atmark: 45,
            Name:   "singerID",
          },
        },
        Right: &ast.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "=",
          Left: &ast.Param{
            Atmark: 61,
            Name:   "singerID",
          },
          Right: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 73,
            NameEnd: 81,
            Name:    "SingerID",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerID = @singerID AND @singerID = SingerID
